text: Athaba pache tomara balo -- ''yadi amadera kache grantha abatirna hato tabe amara tadera ca'ite bhalobhabe supathagami hatama.’’ Ekhana to tomadera kache tomadera prabhura kacha theke eseche spasta pramana ebam pathanirdesa o kuruna. Ata'eba tara ca'ite ke besi an'yayakari ye allah‌ra nirdesasamuha pratyakhyana kare ara se-saba theke phire yaya? Yara amadera nirdesabali theke phire yaya tadera amara acire'i pratiphala debo nikrsta sasti diye, yehetu tara phire yeto.
